synopsis.text:
Zeon remnants and Earth Federation Forces clash in U.C. 0096, three years after Char's Rebellion, as they both aim to prevent the Vist Foundation from handing over the enigmatic Laplace's Box to the Sleeves. Amidst this turmoil, Banagher Links, an ordinary boy residing at the Industrial 7 colony, encounters a mysterious girl named Audrey Burne. Audrey is on a mission to stop the transfer of Laplace's Box, fearing it could spark another devastating war.

As the colony transforms into a battlefield, Banagher finds himself caught in the crossfire. In his search for Audrey, he stumbles upon the legendary Unicorn Gundam, a white mobile suit that holds the key to unlocking the secrets of Laplace's Box. With the fate of the world hanging in the balance, Banagher's life takes a dramatic turn, as he becomes entangled in the century-old curse of the Universal Century. The time has come for the truth behind Laplace's Box and its hidden secrets to be revealed, potentially shattering the fragile peace that has just begun to emerge.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
